mapper.select: SELECT SUM(zdamount) zdamount,SUM(ydamount) ydamount FROM zd_result_week_report_share_m WHERE SUBSTR(`month`,1,07) BETWEEN #{DODATE} AND #{DODATE1}
SELECT `month`, zdamount,ydamount,ROUND(`share`,4) SHARE FROM zd_result_week_report_share_m WHERE SUBSTR(`month`,1,07) BETWEEN #{DODATE} AND #{DODATE1} GROUP BY `month`
SELECT SUBSTR(`month`,1,04) MONTH, SUM(zdamount) zdamount,SUM(ydamount) ydamount,ROUND(`share`,4) SHARE FROM zd_result_week_report_share_m WHERE SUBSTR(`month`,1,07) BETWEEN #{DODATE} AND #{DODATE1}
